Text: Re Tasting demonstration classesPlease respond to infocmbDear Ms Watson We are most happy to welcome you and your group ladies on Monday February at pm to pm for a total of Our metro stop is Ecole militaire we are located near the Invalides and not too far from the Eiffel Tower We take credit card but not American Express only Visa Looking forward to meeting you and your group and thanking you again I remain Sincerely yours Marie Blanche de Broglie a crit Dear Mme MarieBlanche Broglie Good news I have talked with each of the ladies and we would like to book our tasting demonstration class with you for Monday February pm for a total of FF Do you take American Express If so I will send you my credit card number right away I forgot to ask you before where are you located in Paris Which metro stop would we take Many thanks for all of your help and my apologies for taking so long to coordinate with all of the ladies Sincerely Kim Watson email or La Cuisine de MarieBlanche on AM Please respond to To cc Subject Re Tasting demonstration classes Dear MsWatson We will be most happy to welcome your group of ladies on February from to pm As regard the price unfortunately the cost remains the same ie FF up to participants You may pay us now by credit card Looking forward to hearing from you I remain Sincerely yours MarieBlanche de Broglie a crit Dear Mme MarieBlanche de Broglie Please forgive my tardy response to the information you sent me on January regarding a group of women for a tasting class in english please on February from to pm FF per person minimum of persons We have talked to all of the women and have ladies who wish to participate in a tasting demonstration class We would very much like to participate in this type of event would it be possible to still do the class for ladies Do you have one or two persons who would like to take the class with us Would the cost change with either of these options Do we pay now By credit card Thank you so very much Kim Watson email or

is Many thanks for all of your help we are very excited about this class Sincerely Kim Watson email or La Cuisine de MarieBlanche on AM Please respond to To cc Subject Re Tasting demonstration classes
